alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 01 at 7:49PM PST until February 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph through Wednesday Evening. Waves 2 to 5 feet, with the highest waves on the west shore. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong wind gusts up to 100 mph are expected in the higher elevations of the Sierra through Wednesday. These winds may damage trees and lead to hazardous conditions for outdoor recreation.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
